channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: A Complete Guide to the Jeffrey Epstein Document Dumps
item.description: New records about the infamous sex offender are released seemingly every week. Here's a quick rundown of who's releasing the Epstein documents, what they contain—and what they're releasing next.

item.title: Fortuneo durcit ses conditions d’accès à la formule avec Mastercard Gold, et ça fait mal
item.description: Les nouveaux tarifs de la banque en ligne Fortuneo sont tombés. Attention si vous visiez une formule avec Mastercard Gold : les prérequis sont en hausse.

item.title: Fin du port OCuLink ? Le dock graphique Minisforum DEG2 change de stratégie avec ce nouveau connecteur
item.description: Minisforum vient d'officialiser le DEG2, son nouveau dock pour carte graphique externe. La grande nouveauté ? L'arrivée d'un port USB4 v2 capable de débits théoriques monstrueux.

item.title: Apple's Studio Display is $230 off right now
item.description:
Apple’s Studio Display hasn’t been updated since it launched in 2022, but it remains one of the best monitors for the Mac-oriented, and right now you can pick one up for $230 off. This deal applies specifically to the tilt-adjustable model, which means you can’t adjust the height of the built-in stand. That might be a deal-breaker for some users, but if not, $1,368 is a near-record low.
The Studio Display was a product that Apple devotees had been asking the company to make for years. As well as being a solid 27-inch 5K LED monitor, it also packs in a variety of ports and some surprisingly g...

item.title: Facebook met à jour son interface : 4 changements que vous devez connaître
item.description: Meta continue de faire évoluer en douceur l’interface de Facebook, son réseau social historique. Entre un fil d’actualité qui s’inspire d’Instagram, une nouvelle barre latérale plus épurée et des options inédites pour mieux entraîner l’algorithme, la plateforme peaufine son expérience sans chambouler les habitudes de ses utilisateurs. De quoi moderniser Facebook sans provoquer de levée de boucliers....

item.title: Why disconnected tech stacks are undermining your workforce — and how to fix it
item.description: Disconnected systems drain productivity - learn how integrated, adaptive tech can transform your workplace.

item.title: High-end DDR5 RAM kits now costing more than an Nvidia RTX 5090 proves we live in the worst timeline
item.description: Did you think a high-end RAM kit would ever cost more than an Nvidia RTX 5090? Well, it does, and that's truly scary.

item.title: Crunchyroll met fin à sa formule d’abonnement gratuite
item.description: La plateforme de streaming d'animes ferme les vannes de la gratuité. Pour profiter de ses programmes, les utilisateurs gratuits n'auront bientôt plus d'autres choix que de passer par la caisse.

item.title: ChatGPT is Apple’s most downloaded app of 2025 in the US
item.description: This is ChatGPT's first year as the No. 1 app on the U.S. App Store by downloads.

item.title: UK has "no plans" to replicate Australia's social media ban (yet)
item.description: Australian teens are now locked out of their social media accounts as the under-16s ban goes live. If it proves to work, "we would certainly consider it," said UK Culture Secretary Lisa Nandy.

item.title: Amazon now offers same-day delivery of perishable groceries in 2,300 US cities
item.description: The e-commerce giant says it will expand the service to additional cities in 2026.

item.title: La France s’approche doucement du 100 % fibre optique, un peu trop doucement même
item.description: Les derniers chiffres de l'Arcep montre que le raccordement des foyers à la fibre optique suit son cours, avec encore une marge de progression.

item.title: Google Photos takes on CapCut with 5 handy new video-editing tools, including a time-saving template feature
item.description: New templates, music, text, and more – these are the new video-editing features available in Google Photos.

item.title: Smishing’s evolution: from consumer scam to enterprise threat – how industry is fighting back
item.description: Criminals exploit SMS vulnerabilities with advanced tools, turning consumer scams into business-critical risks.

item.title: MasterClass subscriptions are 40 percent off for the holiday season
item.description:
If learning a new skill is one of your New Year's resolutions, then you might want to know that MasterClass subscriptions are currently 40 percent off. This brings the top-tier subscription with offline mode and use on up to six devices down from $240 annually to $144. The entry-level plan, which supports just one device and doesn't offer offline viewing, is marked down to $72 from $120.
Over the past few years, MasterClass has grown to over 200 classes, sessions and original series. You can learn about entrepreneurship from Richard Branson, screenwriting from Aaron Sorkin, cooking from Gord...

item.title: OpenAI hires Slack’s CEO as its chief revenue officer
item.description: OpenAI is bringing Slack CEO Denise Dresser on board to serve as the AI giant's chief revenue officer. In an announcement on Tuesday, OpenAI says Dresser will oversee the company's global revenue strategy, while helping "more businesses put AI to work in their day-to-day operations." Dresser has worked at Slack's parent company, Salesforce, for 12 […]...

item.title: Alamo Drafthouse Is Doing Godzilla Popcorn Buckets, and We’ve Got the Tease of the Next One (Exclusive)
item.description: Sometimes a property and a popcorn bucket are just perfect for each other, and such is the case with Godzilla.

item.description: Let them pick out their own hiking boots. Instead, try gifting a useful blade or a nature journal to delight your outdoorsy friend.

Given all the AI announcements in supercomputing, data centers, and company investments, one might say this was "the year of AI," but this was also the year where we saw design upgrades come to so many smartphones and laptops that 2025 could be called "the year of the flippable, […]

item.title: Oboe raises $16 million from a16z for its AI-powered course generation platform
item.description: Oboe has raised $16 million in funding for its learning app. The company now lets users generate unlimited courses for free.

item.title: Google launches managed MCP servers that let AI agents simply plug into its tools
item.description: Google is rolling out managed MCP servers to make its services “agent-ready by design,” starting with Maps and BigQuery, aiming to simplify messy integrations and help AI agents use real tools.

item.title: Health care plans by the GOP and Democrats are headed to a vote. Here’s why they’re likely to fail
item.description: Senate Majority Leader Thune said that legislation by Democrats lacks sufficient reforms to curb fraud. The Senate is heading toward dueling partisan votes on health care this week after Republicans said Tuesday that they had united around a plan, for now, that would allow COVID-era health care subsidies to expire.Both the Republican plan, which would replace the subsidies with new savings accounts, and a Democratic bill to extend the enhanced Affordable Care Act tax credits for three years lack the bipartisan support needed for passage. Senate Majority Leader John Thune, R-S.D., said Tuesday ...

item.title: Quelle console Nintendo Switch, OLED ou Switch 2, choisir en 2025 ?
item.description: La nouvelle Nintendo Switch 2 est disponible mais le constructeur propose encore plusieurs déclinaisons de la Switch 1 : la Switch classique, la Switch OLED et Lite. Quelles sont les spécificités et les différences de chacune, et quelle Nintendo Switch est faite pour vous ou pour la personne de votre choix ? Switch 2, Switch OLED ou Switch Lite, que choisir ? ...

item.title: Bague connectée : la Galaxy Ring 2 bloquée par Oura ?
item.description: Sortie en juillet 2024, la Galaxy Ring de Samsung n’a toujours pas de successeur et pour cause, Samsung est opposé en justice à la marque de bague connectée Oura. Un différend qui semble devoir obliger la marque à repousser la commercialisation d’une Galaxy Ring 2.

item.title: Fifty US retailers sent nearly 42 billion emails during the Black Friday hype — and they were loaded with sneaky ways to track your habits
item.description: Proton's report into Black Friday and Cyber Monday spam found that retailers are becoming overwhelmingly aggressive in their marketing tactics.

item.title: L’excellente offre du Black Friday sur la nouvelle Apple Watch Ultra 3 est de retour aujourd’hui seulement
item.description: L'Apple Watch Ultra 3 est une montre connectée entièrement dédiée au sport et à la santé. Pour le Black Friday, elle était disponible à 649 euros au lieu de 899 euros sur Rakuten et cette offre est de retour aujourd'hui !

item.title: Amazon Echo, Google Nest, HomePod… quelles sont les meilleures enceintes connectées en 2025 ?
item.description: Vous avez décidé d'installer une ou plusieurs enceintes connectées chez vous ? Google Nest Mini, Amazon Echo, Apple HomePod… Il y a du choix ! On vous aide à y voir plus clair dans cette sélection des meilleures enceintes connectées avec assistant personnel.

item.title: Projectors won us over in 2025
item.description: Not long ago, you may have thought of projectors as complicated, unreliable or just too expensive. In 2025, though, consumer sentiment started to flip. Companies like Anker and Valerion made the projector experience more practical and immersive, helping drive consumer interest and, ultimately, sales. This shift has been quite a few years in the making. LG helped kickstart the projector renaissance back at CES 2018 when it introduced its unusual-looking CineBeam HU80K projector that could provide a 150-inch image. The next year at CES saw the dawn of the ultra short-throw (UST) laser projector ...

item.title: AI companies want a new internet — and they think they’ve found the key
item.description: Over the past 18 months, the largest AI companies in the world have quietly settled on an approach to building the next generation of apps and services - an approach that would allow AI agents from any company to easily access information and tools across the internet in a standardized way. It's a key step […]

item.title: OpenAI report reveals a 6x productivity gap between AI power users and everyone else
item.description: The tools are available to everyone. The subscription is company-wide. The training sessions have been held. And yet, in offices from Wall Street to Silicon Valley, a stark divide is opening between workers who have woven artificial intelligence into the fabric of their daily work and colleagues who have barely touched it.The gap is not small. According to a new report from OpenAI analyzing usage patterns across its more than one million business customers, workers at the 95th percentile of AI adoption are sending six times as many messages to ChatGPT as the median employee at the same compani...

item.title: Taiwan blocks RedNote app, sparking VPN surge
item.description: The popular Chinese social media and e-commerce app has been blocked by the Taiwanese government due to fears of fraud and data harvesting. But users are finding ways to stay connected.

item.title: Unacademy’s founder says startup is now worth less than $500M, confirms M&A talks
item.description: Unacademy's valuation has dropped by over 85% from its pandemic-era peak price tag of $3.5 billion, its founder said.

item.title: Kindle Scribe Colorsoft review: A very particular set of skills, for a price
item.description: In a world where notifications persistently compete for our attention, distraction-free ereaders and writing tablets have found an audience. Putting your phone, laptop or iPad aside and curling up with a Kindle or a reMarkable tablet have become an almost ironic way for the tech-savvy to disconnect from online noise and focus on reading and writing. It’s debatable how broad the appeal of these devices is, but even in what appears to be a relatively small slice of the industry, the competition is fierce. Amazon is arguably the biggest name in the space, with its Kindles dominating the ereader m...

item.title: Quelles sont les meilleures tablettes tactiles à acheter en 2025 ?
item.description: La bonne vieille tablette tactile trouve toujours sa place dans nos foyers. Pour savoir laquelle choisir, de la petite tablette pas chère aux iPad Pro les plus puissants, vous êtes au bon endroit. Voici notre sélection des meilleures tablettes du marché.

item.title: Aurora will have ‘hundreds’ of driverless trucks on the road by the end of 2026, CEO says
item.description: It's been a year of progress and delays for Aurora, the Pittsburgh-based autonomous trucking company founded by Chris Urmson. After promising to launch commercial driverless truck operations in 2024, the company was forced to push the start date until April 2025. A few weeks later, however, it was forced to put safety drivers back in […]

item.title: A pay-to-scrape AI licensing standard is now official
item.description: An open licensing standard that aims to make AI companies pay for the content they vacuum up across the web is now an official specification. Really Simple Licensing 1.0 - or RSL for short - gives publishers the ability to dictate licensing and compensation rules to the web crawlers that visit their sites. The RSL […]

It certainly did for me. The good news is that in just three months, AMD has more than doubled the number of games that support the flagship machine-learning version […]

item.title: Figma adds more Photoshop-like AI tools for image editing
item.description: Figma is launching three new AI-powered creative tools to help users edit their images without jumping to another platform. The new tools are available in Figma Design and Figma Draw, and can be used to quickly remove objects from an image, isolate objects so they can be repositioned, and extend images beyond their previous dimensions. item.title: Multicity flights are a mess. Navan says it finally fixed them
item.description: The revamped feature uses data, airline partnerships, and pricing logic to build complex itineraries travelers once had to piece together manually. Consider this: You want to book a multicity, international trip with flights from New York City to London, then Paris, and then back to New York City. There are numerous variables in the mix—different airlines, various ticketing levels, and more—that make the booking more complicated than anticipated. Accordingly, you may end up booking several separate flights, with multiple tickets and confirmation codes to keep track of. ...

item.title: Google Pixel 10a : la fiche technique fuite, et ça sent pas bon
item.description: Un document de certification repéré chez l'opérateur américain Verizon dévoile plusieurs caractéristiques du Pixel 10a... Et il n'y a pas de quoi sauter au plafond.

item.title: Ce pack avec le nouveau Philips Hue Bridge Pro perd déjà un tiers de son prix
item.description: Le nouveau cerveau "Pro" de l'écosystème Hue de Philips est sorti sur le marché lors de l'IFA 2025 en septembre. Il est déjà proposé dans un pack de découverte avec des ampoules pour (re)partir sur une bonne base. Le pack Hue Bridge Pro s'affiche à 134,99 euros au lieu de 199,99 euros sur Amazon.

item.title: Space-related stocks rise on SpaceX IPO rumor: Date could be next year for the biggest listing since Saudi Aramco
item.description: Companies including EchoStar and Rocket Lab saw their shares rise on a report that Elon Musk’s aerospace company could be gearing up to go public. A SpaceX initial public offering might be on the horizon.

item.title: Galaxy S26 : pourquoi il risque de décevoir sur un point crucial
item.description: Samsung s’apprêterait à recycler les capteurs photo du S25 pour son futur Galaxy S26. Une décision de dernière minute imposée par l'agressivité tarifaire de l'iPhone 17.

item.title: Petco takes down Vetco website after exposing customers’ personal information
item.description: TechCrunch found Petco's veterinary clinics were spilling customers' personal information and medical histories of their pets to the open web.

item.title: EU pledges 90 percent cut to carbon emissions by 2040
item.description: The European Union has provisionally agreed to reduce greenhouse gas emissions by 90 percent (based on 1990 levels) by 2040, the EU parliament announced in a press release. That goes beyond the goals of most other major economies, including China, but falls short of the original one recommended by the EU's climate science advisors. "The target delivers on the need for climate action while safeguarding our competitiveness and security," said Denmark's minister Lars Aagaard, who helped negotiate the deal. The new accord — a vital step in the bloc's long-term goal of achieving climate neutrality...

item.description: For new users in India, Google is offering an AI Plus subscription for ₹199 ($2.21) for the first six months, after which you'll have to pay ₹399 ($4.44).

item.title: Freebox Ultra Essentiel VS SFR Fibre Premium : laquelle de ces box internet haut de gamme et Wi-Fi 7 est la meilleure ?
item.description: Pourquoi opposer la Freebox Ultra Essentiel à la SFR Box 10+ de l'offre SFR Fibre Premium ? Ces deux routeurs partagent comme points communs leur fiche technique premium (débit 8 Gb/s symétrique, Wi-Fi 7...) mais aussi d'appartenir aux forfaits les plus abordables dans la tranche haut de gamme. Voyons ici laquelle mérite votre attention.
